A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly. I was so happy. Not only did they avoid some half assed false redemption of a self absorbed\, solipsistic dick-wad; they did it with some kick ass graphics\, and without killing off the black guy. Props. I also particularly love that this film is pissing off so many fanboys. Honestly\, people take this franchise so seriously. If you can't watch something like this and have fun\, the problem lies with you\, not the film. It's not perfect. Maybe a wee bit long. But it wasn't achingly dull and painful like the Magnificent 7\, which made me wish I was the one being shot. All the love to CF. I don't know what they'll do in the next one with out her...
